"Shapira wants people to know he's not against Glass, just the folks who use it with questionable manners. It's an "amazing piece of technology," he says, that sometimes unfortunately "voids any chance of honest communication in a space where it is present."\
	\
	What a d*ck.\
	\
	I can record you with a tablet and a smartphone 6 ways and you will never know.\
	Get over yourself. As if anything this person chucks out is so worthy of recording.
